schema.name: Roast Turkey Salad

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your vegetables: chop the cabbage, dice the onion, slice the cucumber, and chop the carrots.
In a large bowl, combine the chopped cabbage, diced onion, sliced cucumber, and chopped carrots.
Cut the roasted turkey breast into bite-sized pieces and add to the bowl with the vegetables.
Toss all the ingredients together until well mixed. If desired, add your favorite low-carb dressing to enhance the flavor.

schema.description: This Roast Turkey Salad is the perfect combination for anyone looking for a healthy, low-carb, and low-sugar meal. Full of freshness and flavor, it brings together the best of healthified recipes to create a dish that's not only delicious but also good for you.
